code: import Constant from'../Constants/MarketConstant';import{MarketService}from'../Services/MarketService';var AddMarketItem=function AddMarketItem(_value){return function(_dispatch){MarketService.AddMarketItem(_value).then(function(_response){if(!_response.success){return;}_dispatch(Success(_response.data));}).catch(function(_ex){});};function Success(_item){return{type:Constant.AddMarketItemSuccess,Payload:_item};}};var GetAllItem=function GetAllItem(_marketId){return function(_dispatch){MarketService.GetAllItem(_marketId).then(function(_response){if(!_response.success){}_dispatch(Success(_response.data));}).catch(function(_ex){});};function Success(_item){return{type:Constant.GetAllItemSuccess,Payload:_item};}};var UpdateItem=function UpdateItem(_item){return function(_dispatch){MarketService.UpdateItem(_item).then(function(_response){if(!_response.success){}_dispatch(Success(_response.data));}).catch(function(_ex){});};function Success(_data){return{type:Constant.UpdateMarketItemSuccess,Payload:_data};}};var GetItem=function GetItem(_id){return function(_dispatch){MarketService.GetItemById(_id).then(function(_response){if(!_response.success){}_dispatch(Success(_response.data));}).catch(function(_ex){});};function Success(_data){return{type:Constant.GetItemByIdSuccess,Payload:_data};}};export default{AddMarketItem:AddMarketItem,GetAllItem:GetAllItem,UpdateItem:UpdateItem,GetItem:GetItem};
